sudoku.util

Class MapUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.util.MapUtil

  • public class MapUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility functions for maps.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <K,V> V maybeGet(java.util.Map<K,V> map, K key, V defaultValue)
      Returns the value in the map at the specified key, or the default value if the key does not exist in the map.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • maybeGet

        public static <K,V> V maybeGet(java.util.Map<K,V> map,
               K key,
               V defaultValue)
        Returns the value in the map at the specified key, or the default value if the key does not exist in the map.
        Type Parameters:
        K - key type of the map
        V - value type of the map
        Parameters:
        map - the map to get from
        key - the key to retrieve from the map
        defaultValue - value to return if they key does not exist
        Returns:
        the value at the key, or the defaultValue if it doesn't exist
